Paragraphs: Dr. Wells stared at the glowing device on his workbench, his heart racing with excitement.
'This will change everything,' he muttered, his fingers dancing over the controls.
With a hiss and a flash of light, the time machine came to life, its hum filling the room.
The machine roared to life, and Dr. Wells felt a rush of wind as the room dissolved into a blur.
When the dust settled, he found himself standing in a bustling marketplace, the sights and smells overwhelming.
'This is... the 18th century,' he whispered, marveling at his success.
